item.name: Golden Bull Helmet
item.description: A golden helmet worn by the most ferocious warriors.
item.effect: HP +120, M. Attack -52 / Double Damage +20% / Critical Damage +15 / Attack Speed +10% / VIT Defense -39% / Accuracy -15 / Melee only / Requires Level 90 / Strength 70+, Vitality 50+ and Luck 50+ required to activate the bonuses
